actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; International Trade Commission; Office of U.S. Trade Representative; Treasury Department; State Department; Commerce Department; Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to impose a one-tenth of one cent duty on apple and pear juice.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to impose a one-tenth of a cent per gallon duty on apple or pear juice.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to impose a one-tenth of one cent duty on apple and pear juice.
